sentences.en: a wind-up gramophone with a big horn
sentences.cn: 带有一个大喇叭形扬声器的发条式留声机

sentences.en: He can logically infer that if the battery is dead then the horn will not sound.
sentences.cn: 他可以符合逻辑地推测,如果蓄电池用完了,喇叭也就不会响了.

sentences.en: He honked his horn as he went past.
sentences.cn: 他经过时按响了汽车喇叭.

sentences.en: He played the tune on the horn.
sentences.cn: 他用号吹奏了这首曲子.

sentences.en: I never hoot my horn when I pick a girl up for a date.
sentences.cn: 我开车接女孩出去约会时从不按喇叭。

sentences.en: She gave a sharp toot on her horn.
she got on the horn to complain.
The driver blew her horn when the child stepped in front of the car.
sentences.cn: 当那小孩走到汽车前面时,司机按响了喇叭.

sentences.en: The journey round Cape Horn demanded a high degree of seamanship.
sentences.cn: 绕好望角航行要求有高超的航海技术.

sentences.en: The knife has a horn handle.
The storms had abated by the time they rounded Cape Horn.
sentences.cn: 他们绕过合恩角时，暴风雨已经减弱。

sentences.en: This horn is out of tune.
We drove through red traffic lights, the horn blaring.
sentences.cn: 我们鸣着喇叭，闯过红灯。
